title: How to perform sujood tilawah (sujood of recitation) during prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: how do we perform the sujud of recitation for example surat al-hajj has two sajdah in the middle and at the end so if i'm praying taraweeh or night prayer and i come to a a verse of sajdah and i read it until i finish it what should i do well you say allahu akbar and you go for sujud immediately subhanallah three times and then you say allahu akbar and you stand up immediately and continue to read if you don't want to continue to read you go immediately to the court and saying allahu akbar this is the way to be done during salat muhammad
